sentences.en: Felicity seemed pleased at the suggestion.
sentences.cn: 费莉西蒂好像对这个建议很满意。

sentences.en: He agreed to her suggestion begrudgingly.
sentences.cn: 他不情愿地同意了她的建议。

sentences.en: He bristled with indignation at the suggestion that he was racist.
sentences.cn: 有人暗示他是个种族主义者，他对此十分恼火。

sentences.en: He sniffed, fidgeting in discomfort, uneasy at the suggestion.
sentences.cn: 他吸了吸鼻子，对这项提议感到窘迫不安，心烦意乱。

sentences.en: Hers was the suggestion I acted upon.
sentences.cn: 我是按照她的建议去做的。

sentences.en: I would challenge the, er, suggestion that we're in third place.
sentences.cn: 我不太同意，呃，我们位居第三的说法。

sentences.en: Isabelle is quick to refute any suggestion of intellectual snobbery.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔对于任何关于她恃才傲物的暗示都迅速予以否认。

sentences.en: Perhaps he'd followed her suggestion of a stroll to the river.
sentences.cn: 也许他已经听从了她的建议去河边散步了。

sentences.en: The two leaders were flummoxed by the suggestion.
sentences.cn: 两个领导被这个建议搞晕了。

sentences.en: There is no suggestion that clients have been sold inappropriate policies.
sentences.cn: 无迹象表明向客户售出了不适用的保险。

sentences.en: We reject any suggestion that the law needs amending.
sentences.cn: 对于任何暗示该法律需要修改的观点我们都拒绝接受。

sentences.en: We trust that he and his department are considering our suggestion.
sentences.cn: 我们估计他和他的部门正在考虑我们的建议。

sentences.en: We would view favourably any sensible suggestion for maintaining the business.
sentences.cn: 我们欢迎为维持业务稳定而提出的所有合理建议。
沃尔夫对我的建议置若罔闻。
